experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Lead the frontend platform team building a design system used by 40+ engineers. Architected a micro-frontend migration that reduced deployment times by 60% and improved team autonomy. Mentored junior developers and drove adoption of TypeScript across the organization.

experience.title: Product Development Manager
experience.description: Built and maintained client-facing web applications for enterprise customers. Implemented a real-time collaboration feature using WebSockets that increased user engagement by 35%. Designed RESTful APIs and optimized database queries for a 10x improvement in response times.

experience.title: Software Designer
experience.description: Developed responsive marketing sites and e-commerce platforms for agency clients. Introduced component-driven development workflows and automated testing pipelines that cut QA time in half.
